pullrequest.title: Model editor's new joint maker interface

content.raw:
@spaepcke Should we do a user study to go through @scpeters suggestions? There are three main things to think about:

1. Save the model to a filename with a timestamp suffix, e.g.  ~/defaultModel_0_yyyy-mm-dd_hh-MM-SS.sdf

2. Two clicks to select a part of a model (you mentioned this is ok in the above comment)

3. show a more obvious way to exit the model editor
content.html:
@spaepcke Should we do a user study to go through @scpeters suggestions? There are three main things to think about:

  1. Save the model to a filename with a timestamp suffix, e.g. ~/defaultModel_0_yyyy-mm-dd_hh-MM-SS.sdf

  2. Two clicks to select a part of a model (you mentioned this is ok in the above comment)

  3. show a more obvious way to exit the model editor
